mapper.select: SELECT m.userId AS sellerId, m.userName AS sellerName, m.userEmail AS sellerEmail, p.productId, p.productName, p.productDesc, p.price, p.quantity, p.quality, p.productStatus, p.viewCount, pi.imagePath AS productImage, pi.isMain AS isMainImage, r.reviewId, r.content AS reviewContent, r.rating AS reviewRating, r.regDate AS reviewDate, r.writerId AS reviewWriterId FROM tbl_product p JOIN tbl_member m ON p.sellerId = m.userId LEFT JOIN tbl_product_image pi ON p.productId = pi.productId LEFT JOIN tbl_order o ON o.productId = p.productId LEFT JOIN tbl_review r ON r.orderId = o.orderId WHERE m.userId = #{sellerId} ORDER BY p.productId, r.regDate DESC;
SELECT r.*, p.productId, p.productName FROM tbl_review AS r INNER JOIN tbl_order AS o ON r.orderId = o.orderId INNER JOIN tbl_product AS p ON p.productId = o.productId WHERE p.sellerId = #{sellerId}

SELECT SUM(r.rating)/COUNT(r.rating) AS starAvg FROM tbl_review AS r INNER JOIN tbl_order AS o ON r.orderId = o.orderId INNER JOIN tbl_product AS p ON p.productId = o.productId WHERE p.sellerId = #{sellerId}
